meanings.definition: Having columns at both ends but not along the sides.
meanings.sent1: The small amphiprostyle gazebo in the park had columns at its front and back.
meanings.sent2: The ancient amphiprostyle building showcased its unique architectural design.
meanings.sent3: The amphiprostyle house looked like a sandwich with columns as bread slices.
meanings.sent4: Her amphiprostyle hairstyle framed her face elegantly.
meanings.sent5: The amphiprostyle arrangement of flowers created a stunning entrance.

meanings.definition: A building or temple with columns at both the front and back but not along the sides.
meanings.sent1: The amphiprostyle temple stood majestically with columns at its entrance and exit.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the grandeur of the amphiprostyle structure in the city center.
meanings.sent3: The amphiprostyle building seemed like a doorway to another world.
meanings.sent4: The amphiprostyle architecture symbolized strength and balance.
meanings.sent5: The amphiprostyle monument was a sight to behold during sunset.
